budget.notes: Excludes travel to and from Chikmagalur

items.name: Mullayanagiri Peak
items.description: Ascend to the highest peak in Karnataka for breathtaking panoramic views. Enjoy a refreshing trek.

cost_estimate.notes: Shared jeep cost, combined for both peaks

items.name: Baba Budangiri (Datta Peeta)
items.description: Explore this scenic mountain range known for its caves and spiritual significance.

items.name: Relaxation in Chikmagalur Town
items.description: Return to town to unwind and enjoy a local dinner.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Shared jeep for Mullayanagiri and Baba Budangiri to optimize cost and time for these remote locations.
itinerary.notes: Light rain and cloudy conditions are possible; carry a light waterproof jacket or umbrella. Wear comfortable trekking shoes. Enquire about shared jeeps from Chikmagalur bus stand early morning. Be sure to enquire about the 'online vehicular slot system' for popular attractions like Mullayanagiri closer to your travel date to avoid any last-minute issues.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Experience
items.description: Take a leisurely stroll through a local coffee plantation. Immerse yourself in the lush greenery and learn about coffee cultivation.

cost_estimate.notes: Scooter rental for the day. Free walk.

items.name: Hirekolale Lake
items.description: Relax by the tranquil Hirekolale Lake, a perfect spot for serenity and beautiful views, especially during sunset.

items.name: Explore Chikmagalur Town
items.description: Discover the local market and enjoy another delightful dinner.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Renting a scooter for the day (approx. ₹500) will provide excellent flexibility and cost-efficiency for visiting the plantation and the lake.
itinerary.notes: Passing showers are expected; keep your rain gear handy. Ensure you have a valid driving license if you opt for a scooter rental.

items.name: AyyanaKere Lake
items.description: Visit the picturesque AyyanaKere Lake, one of the oldest in the region, surrounded by hills and offering a peaceful environment.

items.name: Lunch & Souvenir Shopping
items.description: Enjoy a final local meal and pick up some souvenirs from Chikmagalur town.

items.name: Departure Preparation
items.description: Head back to your transport hub for your onward journey.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Local bus from Chikmagalur bus stand to AyyanaKere Lake. Walk in town.
itinerary.notes: Showers are expected early in the day; plan your morning activities accordingly.

total_estimated_cost.breakdown_notes: Approximate total for activities, local transport, and food.

budget.notes: Excludes travel to and from Chikmagalur. For local transport, food, and activities.

items.name: Arrival & Settle In
items.description: Arrive in Chikmagalur and check into your accommodation.

cost_estimate.notes: Accommodation cost not included in budget.

items.name: Coffee Estate Stroll
items.description: Enjoy a peaceful walk through sprawling coffee estates, breathing in the fresh aroma and enjoying the serene environment.

items.name: Sunset at Hirekolale Lake
items.description: Witness a serene sunset over the tranquil waters of Hirekolale Lake, surrounded by green hills.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Local KSRTC buses or shared auto-rickshaws within Chikmagalur town for the coffee estate, and then a shared auto to Hirekolale Lake.
itinerary.notes: Dress appropriately for rain (raincoat, umbrella).

items.name: Mullayanagiri & Baba Budangiri Viewpoints
items.description: Visit Mullayanagiri and Baba Budangiri for breathtaking panoramic views of the Western Ghats. Trekking might be slippery due to rain, but you can enjoy the viewpoints.

cost_estimate.notes: Approx. for entry/trekking fee if applicable + shared jeep cost.

items.notes: Trails will be slippery and foggy. Wear sturdy, waterproof shoes with good grip. Avoid venturing too close to the edge of cliffs or waterfalls.

items.name: Manikyadhara Falls
items.description: Experience the beauty of Manikyadhara Falls, a spiritual site with cascading water amidst lush surroundings. Exercise extreme caution near the water due to increased flow.

cost_estimate.notes: Approx. for shared jeep from Baba Budangiri area.

items.notes: Exercise extreme caution near the water due to increased flow. Prioritize safety.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Best to hire a shared jeep for these spots from Chikmagalur town or Mullayanagiri base. Inquire with local drivers about shared options to keep costs down.
itinerary.notes: Always prioritize safety. Carry light snacks and water. Food options limited on peaks.

items.name: Ayyanakere Lake
items.description: Relax by the banks of Ayyanakere Lake, enjoy the reflections, and soak in the calm atmosphere.

items.name: Kalhatti Falls
items.description: Enjoy the beauty of Kalhatti Falls, a tranquil and picturesque waterfall nestled amidst greenery. Be cautious of slippery rocks and strong currents.
items.notes: Be cautious of slippery rocks and strong currents due to monsoon.

items.name: Departure
items.description: Head back to Chikmagalur town and proceed with your onward journey.
items.notes: Ensure enough time for travel to departure point.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Local KSRTC buses or shared jeeps can take you to Ayyanakere and Kalhatti Falls. Confirm timings in advance.
itinerary.notes: Keep your belongings secure.

items.name: Sunrise at Mullayanagiri
items.description: Sunrise trek to Mullayanagiri, the highest peak in Karnataka, for panoramic views.

cost_estimate.notes: Free for trekking; minimal for shared jeep to base if not walking.

items.notes: Be prepared for slippery trails after rain. Wear appropriate footwear.

items.name: Baba Budangiri Caves
items.description: Visit the ancient Baba Budangiri Caves, known for their historical significance and serene surroundings.

items.name: Jhari Waterfalls
items.description: Relax by the beautiful Jhari Waterfalls (Buttermilk Falls), perfect for photography and unwinding.

cost_estimate.notes: Entry fee; shared jeep to falls from main road ~₹50-100.

items.name: Local Dinner
items.description: Enjoy a simple, authentic South Indian dinner at a local eatery.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Consider renting a scooter (approx. ₹300-400) or utilize shared jeeps/local buses.
itinerary.notes: Carry water and wear appropriate footwear, especially for treks.

items.name: Hebbe Falls Adventure
items.description: Embark on an adventure to Hebbe Falls; journey by shared jeep through dense forests, enjoying magnificent falls.

cost_estimate.notes: Shared jeep ride from Muthodi or nearest point ~₹150-250 per person.

items.notes: Jeep ride can be bumpy; rain will make it muddier.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Stroll & Museum
items.description: Take a leisurely walk through a coffee plantation and learn about cultivation. Optionally, visit the Coffee Museum.

cost_estimate.notes: Free for plantation walk, Coffee Museum entry ~₹50-100.

items.name: Sunset at Hirekolale Lake
items.description: Watch the sunset reflecting on the calm waters of Hirekolale Lake.

items.name: Dinner
items.description: Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant trying out some local delicacies.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Shared jeeps for Hebbe Falls. Rented scooter or local bus for coffee plantations and Hirekolale Lake.
food_picks: Malnad cuisine: spicy chicken/vegetarian curry with Akki Roti or Neer Dosa.
itinerary.notes: Carry a light jacket or poncho. Stay hydrated.

items.name: Kavikal Gandi Viewpoint
items.description: Visit Kavikal Gandi Viewpoint (Horse Shoe Viewpoint) for stunning panoramic views of the Western Ghats.

items.name: Relaxation & Souvenirs
items.description: Relax at your homestay, or browse the local market for coffee, spices, or souvenirs.

items.name: Departure
items.description: Check out from your accommodation and prepare for your onward journey.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Local buses or a rented scooter.
itinerary.notes: Keep an eye on local weather updates.

total_estimated_cost.breakdown_notes: Based on budget homestay, local food, and shared/scooter transport. Can range up to ₹5500.

budget.notes: Excluding to and from Sakleshpur travel

items.name: Arrival & Settle In
items.description: Arrive in Sakleshpur, check into accommodation.

cost_estimate.notes: Accommodation cost not included in daily activity cost.

items.name: Manjarabad Fort
items.description: Explore the unique star-shaped fort with historical insights and panoramic views of the surrounding Western Ghats.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Stroll
items.description: Enjoy a leisurely walk through a nearby coffee plantation.

items.name: Riverside Tranquility
items.description: Find a peaceful spot by the Hemavathi River or simply unwind at your accommodation.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Manjarabad Fort is ~10km from town (auto-rickshaw/local bus). Coffee plantations often walkable from homestays.
food_picks: Local Eateries in Sakleshpur Town (Malnad cuisine)
itinerary.notes: Wear comfortable shoes for walking. Bring insect repellent for the evening.

items.name: Bisle Ghat Viewpoint
items.description: Scenic drive to breathtaking panoramic vistas of the 'Green Route' and three mountain ranges.

items.name: Hemavathi Dam & Backwater
items.description: Visit the serene dam and its expansive backwaters for quiet reflection.

items.name: Sakleshwara Temple
items.description: Explore the ancient Sakleshwara Temple on the banks of the Hemavathi River.

items.name: Local Market Exploration
items.description: Stroll through the local market for coffee, spices, and other regional produce.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Bisle Ghat is ~50km from town (taxi/shared auto). Hemavathi Dam and Sakleshwara Temple are closer to town and accessible by auto.
itinerary.notes: Roads to Bisle Ghat can be winding; drive carefully if raining. Carry binoculars, snacks, water.

items.name: Bettada Byraveshwara Temple & Pandavar Gudda
items.description: Visit ancient temple amidst hills and Pandavar Gudda for views and history (paths can be muddy).
items.location: Bettada Byraveshwara Temple / Pandavar Gudda, Sakleshpur

items.name: Relaxed Lunch & Departure Prep
items.description: Enjoy a final local meal, last-minute souvenir shopping, prepare for departure.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Temples/hills ~20-30km from town (auto/taxi recommended).
itinerary.notes: Check road conditions and accessibility to remote areas, as heavy rain can impact routes.

total_estimated_cost.breakdown_notes: Upper estimate from budget breakdown, excluding travel to/from Sakleshpur.

items.name: Madikeri Fort
items.description: Explore the historical fort, which houses a church, a temple, and a prison. It offers insights into the region's past.
items.notes: Arrive in Madikeri and check into accommodation. Exercise caution due to past weather events.

items.name: Omkareshwara Temple
items.description: Visit this unique Shiva temple blending Gothic and Islamic architectural styles. It has a calming pond with fish.

items.name: Raja's Seat
items.description: Enjoy panoramic views of the surrounding hills and valleys, especially beautiful if the clouds clear. There's a musical fountain here (check timings, usually evenings).

items.name: Stroll through Madikeri town & relax
items.description: Stroll through Madikeri town, exploring local markets. Relax at a local cafe with a cup of Coorg coffee. Enjoy the sunset from a good vantage point if weather permits.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Madikeri town attractions are within walking distance or a short auto-rickshaw ride (negotiate fares).
itinerary.notes: Expect pleasant temperatures with a chance of light rain. Carry a light jacket and an umbrella. Wear comfortable walking shoes. Exercise caution due to past weather events.

items.name: Abbey Falls
items.description: A beautiful waterfall surrounded by lush greenery and coffee plantations. The walk to the falls is refreshing.
items.notes: Take a local bus from Madikeri or a shared auto.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Walk
items.description: Many plantations near Madikeri offer free or low-cost guided walks where you can learn about coffee cultivation. Ask locals for recommendations for small, independent plantations.

cost_estimate.notes: Free (some may offer tastings for a small fee)

items.notes: Inquire about local bus schedules to Abbey Falls in advance. Be careful on potentially slippery paths near the waterfall.

items.name: Leisure & Local Flavors
items.description: Return to Madikeri. Spend some time exploring more local shops for Coorg coffee, spices, and homemade chocolates. Consider a quiet evening for reading or journaling.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Local bus or shared auto for Abbey Falls. Walking for the plantation tour.
itinerary.notes: Light rain is expected; keep your umbrella handy. Exercise caution due to past weather events.

items.name: Namdroling Monastery (Golden Temple), Bylakuppe
items.description: A vibrant Tibetan Buddhist monastery, one of the largest in India. The intricate architecture and peaceful ambiance are captivating.
items.notes: Take a KSRTC bus from Madikeri to Kushalnagar. From Kushalnagar, take a shared auto or local bus to Bylakuppe. Plan bus timings carefully.

items.name: Kaveri Nisargadhama
items.description: A beautiful island formed by the Kaveri river, with a deer park, hanging bridge, and bamboo groves. It's a peaceful spot to relax.
items.notes: Accessible by auto or local bus from Kushalnagar. The weather will remain pleasant with chances of light rain. Keep emergency contact numbers handy.

items.name: Departure
items.description: Start your journey back from Kushalnagar/Madikeri, depending on your onward travel plans.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Public buses and shared autos are best for budget travel to Bylakuppe and Kaveri Nisargadhama.
itinerary.notes: Plan your bus timings for Bylakuppe and Kushalnagar carefully to avoid long waits. The weather will remain pleasant with chances of light rain. Keep emergency contact numbers handy. Exercise caution due to past weather events.

total_estimated_cost.breakdown_notes: Estimated costs based on budget accommodation, local food, and public transport. Can be adjusted based on spending habits.

budget.notes: Excluding to and from Coorg travel expenses

items.name: Arrival & Relaxation
items.description: Arrive in Chikmagalur and check into your pre-booked budget accommodation (ensure it fits within your ₹5000 budget). Freshen up and enjoy a traditional South Indian breakfast at a local eatery.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Tour
items.description: Head out for a guided tour of a local coffee plantation. Learn about coffee cultivation, enjoy the lush greenery, and savor the aroma.

cost_estimate.notes: Estimated cost for tour, can vary up to 500 INR

items.name: Town Exploration & Dinner
items.description: Stroll through Chikmagalur town's local market. Explore the shops, interact with locals, and enjoy a simple, local dinner.

cost_estimate.notes: Estimated cost for dinner, can be up to 200 INR

itinerary.mobility_tips: Short auto-rickshaw rides or local bus within town. Consider renting a scooter for the duration of your trip if comfortable, which offers flexibility and cost-effectiveness for a solo traveler (around ₹500/day plus fuel).
itinerary.notes: Light rain is expected. Carry a lightweight raincoat or umbrella. Wear comfortable walking shoes.

items.name: Mullayanagiri Peak & Seethalayanagiri Temple
items.description: Start early to visit Mullayanagiri Peak, the highest peak in Karnataka, offering breathtaking panoramic views. On the way, stop at Seethalayanagiri Temple.

items.name: Jhari Waterfalls
items.description: Proceed to Jhari Waterfalls. The last few kilometers require a shared jeep due to rugged terrain. Enjoy the refreshing cascade of water amidst dense forests.

cost_estimate.notes: Estimated cost for shared jeep ride (₹100-₹150 per person).

items.name: Baba Budangiri
items.description: Visit Baba Budangiri, a sacred mountain range known for its beautiful scenery and historical significance. It's a great spot to catch a serene sunset if the weather permits.

itinerary.mobility_tips: For this day, a shared jeep covering Mullayanagiri, Jhari Falls, and Baba Budangiri is the most budget-friendly option (around ₹500-₹800). Roads can be winding and potentially slippery.
itinerary.notes: Roads can be winding and potentially slippery due to light rain; exercise caution. Waterproof outerwear is essential. Shared jeeps are recommended for Jhari Falls.

items.name: Hirekolale Lake
items.description: Visit Hirekolale Lake for a peaceful morning. Enjoy the tranquility, click some photos, and simply relax by the calm waters.

items.name: Last Bites & Departure
items.description: Enjoy a final delicious local lunch. Do some last-minute souvenir shopping (e.g., local coffee powder) or relax before heading to your departure point. Check out from accommodation.

cost_estimate.notes: Estimated cost for lunch, can be up to 250 INR

itinerary.mobility_tips: Auto-rickshaw or local bus to Hirekolale Lake.
itinerary.notes: Light rain and cloudy weather are expected. Ensure all belongings are packed for departure.

total_estimated_cost.breakdown_notes: Accommodation (₹1600), Food (₹1500), Activities & Local Transport (₹1400). This leaves a small buffer.

budget.notes: Excluding to and from Chikmagalur expenses. For activities, food, and local transport.

cost_estimate.notes: Estimated cost for tour, can vary up to 500 INR

items.name: Mullayanagiri Peak & Seethalayanagiri Temple

items.name: Jhari Waterfalls
items.description: Proceed to Jhari Waterfalls. The last few kilometers require a shared jeep due to rugged terrain. Enjoy the refreshing cascade of water amidst dense forests.

items.name: Baba Budangiri
items.description: Visit Baba Budangiri, a sacred mountain range known for its beautiful scenery and historical significance. It's a great spot to catch a serene sunset if the weather permits.

itinerary.notes: Roads can be winding and potentially slippery due to light rain; exercise caution. Waterproof outerwear is essential. Shared jeeps are recommended for Jhari Falls.

itinerary.notes: Light rain and cloudy weather are expected. Ensure all belongings are packed for departure.

items.name: Arrival & Settle In
items.description: Arrive in Chikmagalur and check into your accommodation. Freshen up and have breakfast.

cost_estimate.notes: Accommodation costs not included in the 5000 INR budget. Breakfast cost is part of daily food budget.

items.name: Coffee Museum & Mahatma Gandhi Park
items.description: Learn about the history and cultivation of coffee at the Coffee Museum, then enjoy a leisurely stroll in Mahatma Gandhi Park.
items.expected_time_window: 1.5-2 hours for Coffee Museum, 1 hour for Park

cost_estimate.notes: Coffee Museum entry might have a small fee or be free. Park entry is usually free.

items.name: Local Market & Relaxation
items.description: Explore the local market and enjoy a simple, authentic local dinner.

cost_estimate.notes: Dinner cost is part of daily food budget.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Mostly walking within town; local auto-rickshaw for the Coffee Museum if needed.
food_picks: Try local Udupi-style eateries for budget-friendly and delicious South Indian food (dosa, idli, local thali).
itinerary.notes: Carry an umbrella or raincoat. Wear comfortable walking shoes.

items.name: Mullayanagiri Peak
items.description: Head to Mullayanagiri, the highest peak in Karnataka. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views. Be prepared for fog and slippery conditions due to rain.

cost_estimate.notes: Transport cost is part of daily local transport budget.

items.notes: Trek to the summit. Be prepared for fog and slippery conditions.

items.name: Baba Budangiri & Manikyadhara Falls
items.description: Visit the revered shrine at Baba Budangiri and the scenic Manikyadhara Falls, which will be particularly beautiful during the monsoon transition. Exercise caution near the falls.

cost_estimate.notes: Transport cost is part of daily local transport budget.

items.notes: Exercise caution near the falls. Roads can be narrow and winding.

items.name: Return to Chikmagalur & Local Flavors
items.description: Head back to Chikmagalur town and enjoy dinner at a local restaurant.

cost_estimate.notes: Dinner cost is part of daily food budget.

itinerary.mobility_tips: It's best to hire a local shared jeep or take a local bus (if available to specific points) to Mullayanagiri and Baba Budangiri to manage the hilly terrain and cost.

items.name: Arrival & Settle In
items.description: Arrive in Chikmagalur, check into your pre-booked budget-friendly homestay. Take time to relax and acclimate.

items.name: Coffee Museum
items.description: Explore the history and process of coffee making in the region. An excellent indoor activity if it's raining.

items.name: Coffee Plantation Walk
items.description: If the rain is light, enjoy a gentle stroll through a nearby coffee plantation to experience the lush greenery and fresh air.

cost_estimate.notes: Free if accessible from homestay or nominal guide fee if offered

items.name: Town Exploration & Local Flavors
items.description: Explore the main market area of Chikmagalur town.

items.name: Dinner
items.description: Indulge in authentic South Indian cuisine at a budget-friendly local eatery.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Walk or use auto-rickshaws (negotiate fares) for destinations within town.
food_picks: other local eateries on IG Road
itinerary.notes: Due to potential heavy rain, carry an umbrella/raincoat and wear sturdy, non-slip footwear. Always check with your homestay host or local sources for real-time safety updates on plantation access.

items.name: Hirekolale Lake
items.description: Visit this picturesque man-made lake for tranquil views. Enjoy the calm ambiance from a safe distance, especially if it's rainy.

items.name: Manikyadhara Falls (Extreme Caution)
items.description: Drive towards Manikyadhara Falls. If conditions allow and local authorities deem it safe, view the falls from the designated safe platforms. DO NOT attempt to go near the water or trek if there are high water levels or slippery conditions. Prioritize your safety. If unsafe, consider relaxing at a local cafe or exploring more of Chikmagalur town.

items.name: Relaxation & Local Dinner
items.description: Return to your homestay or enjoy a quiet evening in Chikmagalur town.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Consider local buses for Hirekolale Lake and towards the Manikyadhara Falls route to save on costs. Auto-rickshaws for last-mile connectivity where buses don't reach directly. Be prepared for potential walking.
food_picks: Try local delicacies like Akki Roti or Neer Dosa at a small, authentic eatery.
itinerary.notes: Crucial Safety Warning: The roads to waterfalls can become very slippery and dangerous during heavy rain. Always seek local advice before heading out. If conditions are bad, opt for indoor activities or relaxation at your homestay. Avoid Jhari Falls due to the jeep cost (₹800 per jeep) and potentially very muddy/bumpy trails during rain, which may exceed your budget and comfort.

items.name: Leisure & Local Finds
items.description: Enjoy a leisurely morning at your homestay, perhaps with a cup of Chikmagalur's famous coffee. You can also visit a local market for some souvenir shopping if interested.

items.name: Departure Preparation
items.description: Have lunch and prepare for your onward journey from Chikmagalur.

itinerary.mobility_tips: Auto-rickshaw to the bus stand or pick-up point.
food_picks: Try a final local meal, perhaps from a restaurant you enjoyed on Day 1.

items.name: Arrival in Dharamshala & Check-in
items.description: Arrive at Dharamshala (Gaggal) Airport or Pathankot Railway Station. Take local transport to McLeod Ganj and check into your budget accommodation.

cost_estimate.notes: Approx. per person for local bus, shared taxi higher

items.name: Tsuglagkhang Complex (Dalai Lama Temple)
items.description: Visit the official residence of the Dalai Lama, explore the main temple, Namgyal Monastery, and the Tibetan Museum.

items.name: McLeod Ganj Market & Dinner
items.description: Stroll through the bustling McLeod Ganj market, browse for souvenirs, and enjoy a relaxed dinner at a local Tibetan eatery.
